body:
- Fixed editor undo crash
- Fixed many other various crashes
- Fixed units not attacking when patrolling
- Fixed "resources launched" dialog going off-screen
- Many iOS-specific fixes, e.g. crashes
- Added stats for ammo
- Added custom game rules
- Added early-game mender block
- Added setting for locking screen to landscape [Android]
- Added bat/sh run files to distribution [Server]
- Added new wave requirements to zones, removed item requirement
- Added message for attack maps lacking enemy core
- Added Mend Projector stats
- Added new high-tier launchpad with stats
- Made launch pads transfer full inventories instead of single item types
- Smoother edges for tile transitions
- More optimized shadows; FPS jumped from 30->60 on a test phone
- Slightly decreased tech tree cost
- Reduced Ghoul bomber health
- Increased wall health
- Increased Wave turret bullet speed and range
- Increased all Mend Projector stats
- Increased Arc range and damage
- Increased Scatter range, fire rate, bullet speed and damage
- the menu bug refuses to die
name: v4 Build 68 - Beta
